00024 #ifndef _INTEGERSET_HPP_
00025 #define _INTEGERSET_HPP_
00026 
00027 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00028 #include <list>
00029 
00030 
00031 namespace pwiz {
00032 namespace util {
00033 
00034 
00035 /// a virtual container of integers, accessible via an iterator interface,
00036 /// stored as union of intervals
00037 class PWIZ_API_DECL IntegerSet
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     /// a single closed interval of integers 
00042     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Interval
00043     {
00044         int begin;
00045         int end;
00046         
00047         Interval(int a = 0); // allow int conversion
00048         Interval(int a, int b);
00049 
00050         bool contains(int n) const {return n>=begin && n<=end;}
00051 
00052         friend PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Interval& interval);
00053         friend PWIZ_API_DECL std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Interval& interval);
00054     };
00055 
00056     /// collection of Interval objects
00057     typedef std::list<Interval> Intervals;
00058 
00059     /// forward iterator providing readonly access to the virtual container 
00060     class PWIZ_API_DECL Iterator
00061     {
00062         public:
00063 
00064         /// \name instantiation 
00065         //@{
00066         /// default constructed Iterator marks end of any IntegerSet
00067         Iterator(); 
00068 
00069         /// initialized to beginning of the IntegerSet
00070         Iterator(const IntegerSet& integerSet);
00071         //@}
00072 
00073         /// \name forward iterator operators
00074         //@{
00075         Iterator& operator++();
00076         const Iterator operator++(int);
00077         int operator*() const; // note return by value
00078         bool operator!=(const Iterator& that) const; 
00079         bool operator==(const Iterator& that) const; 
00080         //@}
00081 
00082         /// \name standard iterator typedefs 
00083         //@{
00084         typedef std::forward_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00085         typedef int value_type;
00086         typedef int difference_type;
00087         typedef value_type* pointer;
00088         typedef value_type& reference;
00089         //@}
00090 
00091         private:
00092         Intervals::const_iterator it_;
00093         Intervals::const_iterator end_;
00094         int value_;
00095     };
00096 
00097     /// default construction
00098     IntegerSet();
00099 
00100     /// construction with a single integer
00101     explicit IntegerSet(int a);
00102 
00103     /// construction with a single interval
00104     IntegerSet(int a, int b);
00105 
00106     /// \name write access to the virtual container 
00107     //@{
00108 
00109     /// insert an interval of integers into the virtual container
00110     void insert(Interval interval);
00111 
00112     /// insert a single integer into the virtual container
00113     void insert(int a);
00114 
00115     /// insert an interval of integers into the virtual container
00116     void insert(int a, int b);
00117 
00118     /// insert intervals by parsing a string representing a 
00119     /// whitespace-delimited list of closed intervals:
00120     ///   parse(" [-3,2]  [5,5] [8,9] ");  // insert(-3,2); insert(5); insert(8,9);
00121     void parse(const std::string& intervalList);
00122     //@}
00123 
00124     /// \name const iterator interface to the virtual container 
00125     //@{
00126     typedef Iterator const_iterator;
00127     const_iterator begin() const; 
00128     const_iterator end() const; 
00129     //@}
00130 
00131     /// true iff IntegerSet is empty
00132     bool empty() const {return intervals_.empty();}
00133 
00134     /// true iff n is in the IntegerSet
00135     bool contains(int n) const;
00136 
00137     /// true iff n is an upper bound for the IntegerSet 
00138     bool hasUpperBound(int n) const; 
00139 
00140     private:
00141     Intervals intervals_; 
00142 
00143     friend PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const IntegerSet& integerSet);
00144 };
00145 
00146 
00147 } // namespace util 
00148 } // namespace pwiz

00150 
00151 #endif // _INTEGERSET_HPP_
